Title: Beloved
Writer: Toni Morrison (novel), Akosua Busia (screenplay), Richard LaGravenese (screenplay), Adam Brooks (screenplay)
Actors: Yada Beener, Emil Pinnock, Calen Johnson, Oprah Winfrey
Plot: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 23 nominations.
